description: DC Studios revealed its new logo at San Diego Comic-Con and its an homage to Milton Glaser's DC Comics logo from the 1970s to the early 2000s.
title: DC Studios' Logo Has Been Revealed and Its a Nod to a Classic DC Comics Logo | SDCC 2024

description: Amazon has provided the first teaser trailer for Like a Dragon: Yakuza, which is premiering on October 24, exclusively on Prime Video.
title: Yakuza Live-Action Series Reveals Nishiki Casting Along With Comic-Con Teaser Trailer | SDCC 2024

description: NetherRealm has revealed animalities for Mortal Kombat 1 in what marks the return of the fatality variant after a 29-year absence.
title: First Look at Animalities in Mortal Kombat 1 | SDCC 2024

description: Existing subscribers need to take a few extra steps, but it won't make you want to pull your hair out.

description: Attendees of the "Jim Lee & Friends" panel at SDCC were given a special surprise when none other than DC Studios co-CEO James Gunn showed up to reveal the first footage of the upcoming animated series Creature Commandos.
title: Creatures Commando Teaser Trailer Debuts Behind Closed Doors at Comic-Con in First Look at DCU | SDCC 2024

description: Mortal Kombat 1 is keeping its bloody waterfall of post-launch DLC going with a list of new crossover fighters that include Ghostface from Scream, Robert Patrick’s T-1000 Terminator, and Conan the Barbarian.
title: Mortal Kombat 1 Khaos Reigns DLC Revealed, Includes Ghostface, T-1000, and Female Sektor and Cyrax | SDCC 2024

description: Hazbin Hotel creator Vivienne Medrano confirmed on a panel at SDCC 2024 that the series has been greenlit for a third and fourth season.
title: Hazbin Hotel Renewed for Seasons 3 and 4 | SDCC 2024

description: Rick and Morty: The Anime writer and director Takashi Sano will teleport viewers to a new realm of animation in just a few weeks, and that means telling new stories about some of the franchise’s most important characters.
title: Rick and Morty Anime Director Explains Focus on Morty and Lupin III’s Secret Influence | SDCC 2024

description: Earlier this year, news seemed to drop that Prime's animated superhero series Invincible had been renewed for season 4 and 5. At the time, it turned out that news wasn't true, but the good news is that now half of it is: Invinsible has now been renewed for a season 4, for real this time.
title: Invincible Officially Renewed for Season 4, for Real This Time | SDCC 2024

description: Adult Swim debuted a special behind-closed-doors clip of Mappa and Cowboy Bebop creator Shinichirō Watanabe's upcoming anime, Lazarus, at San Diego Comic-Con. The 13-episode anime, which will feature action sequences by John Wick director Chad Stahelski, will premiere in 2025.
title: Adult Swim Debuts Lazarus Behind Closed Doors at Comic-Con | SDCC 2024

description: Disney and BBC announced a brand-new Doctor Who spin-off series called The War Between The Land And The Sea. The five-part series will see the return of Kate Lethbridge-Stewart, Colonel Ibrahim, and the '72-era villains, the Sea Devils.
title: Doctor Who Spin-Off The War Between The Land And The Sea Announced at San Diego Comic-Con

description: Adult Swim’s long-in-development anime Uzumaki has been given a release date of September 28, 2024.
